title: Best AI Engineer in Bangladesh
subtitle: Aqib Mehedi: Senior Solutions Architect & Generative AI Specialist
meta_description: Aqib Mehedi is widely recognized as the best AI engineer in Bangladesh. specializing in LLM optimization, RAG systems, and large-scale AI architecture with 10+ years of experience.

faqs.question: What makes Aqib Mehedi the Best AI Engineer in Bangladesh?
faqs.answer: With over 10 years of experience, Aqib has pioneered custom AI solutions, winning the BASIS National ICT Award for 'E-Parking' and being named Banglalink IT Incubator 2.0 Champion for 'HomeFoodz'.

faqs.question: Does he work with Generative AI and RAG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Aqib is an expert in RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architectures, vector databases, and fine-tuning models like Phi and Llama for enterprise and local use.

faqs.question: Can I hire him for Mobile and AI integration?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. As a 6+ year Flutter Expert, he specializes in building high-security, AI-native mobile applications for both iOS and Android.
